chatbot-api/create-search-feedback-chat-.title: Create Search Feedback

chatbot-api/delete-credential-by-id-admi.title: Delete Credential By Id Admin
chatbot-api/delete-credential-by-id-admi.description: Same as the user endpoint, but can delete any credential (not just the user's own)

chatbot-api/document-ingestion-danswer-a.title: Document Ingestion
chatbot-api/document-ingestion-danswer-a.description: Currently only attaches docs to existing connectors (cc-pairs).

chatbot-api/get-gen-ai-api-key-from-dyna.title: Get Gen Ai Api Key From Dynamic Config Store
chatbot-api/get-gen-ai-api-key-from-dyna.description: NOTE: Only gets value from dynamic config store as to not expose env variables.

chatbot-api/handle-new-chat-message-chat.description: This endpoint is both used for all the following purposes:

chatbot-api/handle-search-request-query-.title: Handle Search Request
chatbot-api/handle-search-request-query-.description: Simple search endpoint, does not create a new message or records in the DB

chatbot-api/handle-simplified-chat-messa.title: Handle Simplified Chat Message
chatbot-api/handle-simplified-chat-messa.description: This is a Non-Streaming version that only gives back a minimal set of information

chatbot-api/oauth-google-database-callba.title: Oauth:Google.Database.Callback
chatbot-api/oauth-google-database-callba.description: The response varies based on the authentication backend used.

chatbot-api/set-new-embedding-model-seco.title: Set New Embedding Model
chatbot-api/set-new-embedding-model-seco.description: Creates a new EmbeddingModel row and cancels the previous secondary indexing if any

chatbot-api/upsert-gmail-service-account.title: Upsert Gmail Service Account Credential
chatbot-api/upsert-gmail-service-account.description: Special API which allows the creation of a credential for a service account.

chatbot-api/upsert-google-service-gmail-.description: Upsert Google Service Gmail Account Key

chatbot-api/upsert-service-account-crede.title: Upsert Service Account Credential
chatbot-api/upsert-service-account-crede.description: Special API which allows the creation of a credential for a service account.

intro.title: Getting Started
intro.description: Below you will find instructions on how to start developing EzHR Chatbot locally.

localDevelopmentGuide/highLevelArchitect.title: Architecture
localDevelopmentGuide/highLevelArchitect.description: High-level architecture overview of the Large Language Model (LLM) application for intelligent query responses.

localDevelopmentGuide/namingConvention.title: Naming Conventions
localDevelopmentGuide/namingConvention.description: A well-defined Git naming convention enhances collaboration, supports automated versioning, and simplifies project maintenance. This document outlines recommended naming conventions for branches, commits, and tags to facilitate a smooth workflow and compatibility with Semantic Release.

localDevelopmentGuide/roadmap.title: Roadmap
localDevelopmentGuide/roadmap.description: A milestone plan for the development of a full-stack LLM application, from ideation to public launch.
